scenario_text.value: Ah! I sense something there, Takuma.

Yeah? Let’s check it out, but be careful.
We’ll be in trouble if it’s an ambush.

WAAAAAH! Save meee! Don’t be mean to me-hee-
heeeeee!
Wait, what? Lady Miu...and her friends?!

I’m so glad you’re safe. I was worried about
you!
We’re here now. Everything’s gonna be okay.
Boo-hoooooo, Lady Miuuu... I was so scurrred.

Now, now, it’s okay... Ah, you’re hurt, too.
You should come with us.
